name: 裴秀暻
introduction: 裴秀暻（Bae sookyung, 裴秀京),韩国知名电影演员，韩国环球小姐。1993年出生于韩国首尔，曾主演过多部韩国电影和国际知名电影：绝命旅途Road kill로드킬(96min | Release date in South Korea：2019/02/21),门 Gate 게이트(92min | Release date in South Korea : 2018/06/20)，阳光姐妹淘Sunny 써니(124min | Release date in South Korea : 2011/05/04).Death Bell 2: Bloody Camp.(90min | Release date in South Korea : 2010/07/28)曾多次获得韩国优秀青年女演员奖项。裴秀暻熟练多国语言：韩文，英文，中文。2019年多次参与中国韩国多档娱乐节目。******************部分主演影片介绍*********************绝命旅途Road kill로드킬96min | Release date in South Korea : 2019/02/21SynopsisAfter a car accident in the mountains, Oh Gwang wakes up in Mr. Jang's house. Oh Gwang, a vicious real estate agent, finds himself rescued by the Jang family who are isolated from society due to heavy rains that cut them off everything, including landlines. The Jangs try to stop Oh Gwang who is in a hurry to leave in order to settle a developing contract. However, he leaves the house anyway and hurts himself.Despite their kindness, the family seems to be hiding from him. Little does he know that a vicious deed from his past involves the family and he's not as safe with them as he seems.
